value::operator= (10 of 24 overloads)

Assignment.

Synopsis 
value&
operator=(
    unsigned long long u);
Description

Replace *this with i.

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.

Complexity

Linear in the size of *this.

Parameters

Name

Description

u

The new value.
